name: peekaping
description: PeekAPing is a self-hosted monitoring tool for running health checks on websites and services. It provides uptime tracking, performance data, and alerting over a custom web UI.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Monitor HTTP endpoints, TCP ports, and custom protocols to verify service health and responsiveness

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Measure response times, latency, and performance trends to identify slowdowns and optimization opportunities

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive notifications via email, Slack, or webhooks when services go down or performance degrades

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Clean web interface displays current status and historical data for all monitored services at a

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Verify not just availability but also response content to detect partial outages or misconfigurations
